@param current: index of current step @param values: list of tuples (name, value_for_last_step). The progress bar will display averages for these values.

xnn.utils.utils.draw_to_file(model, filename, **kwargs)[source]¶

Draws a network diagram to a file :parameters:

  • model : list

    List of the layers, as obtained from lasange.layers.get_all_layers, or model object

  • filename: string

    The filename to save output to.

  • **kwargs: see docstring of _get_pydot_graph for other options
